column4: hello. I keep trying to install Ubuntu, but every time I install it from the CD, and restart the PC, when I turn it on? it tells me to enter a boot CD. Any help? :\
hello. I keep trying to install Ubuntu, but every time I install it from the CD, and restart the PC, when I turn it on? it tells me to enter a boot CD. Any help? :\
But the installation did work, the installer says everthing done, correct?
is the bios of the PC setup to boot from the harddisk? Is Grub installed?
